    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Initialize the database, and bring it to a state where its version can be examined, and it can be upgraded if necessary.
        Specified by:
        init in interface Lifecycle
        Overrides:
        init in class LifecycleAdapter

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the database and make it ready for transaction processing. A database will automatically recover itself, if necessary, when started. If the store files are obsolete (older than oldest supported version), then start will throw an exception.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Lifecycle
        Overrides:
        start in class LifecycleAdapter
